issue.title: [C++][Java][FlightRPC] Add missing metadata on Arrow schemas returned by Flight SQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15314](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15314). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This add an auxiliary class FlightSqlColumnMetadata (Java) and ColumnMetadata(CPP) meant to read and write known metadata for Arrow schema fields, such as:
 \* CATALOG_NAME
 \* SCHEMA_NAME
 \* TABLE_NAME
 \* PRECISION
 \* SCALE
 \* IS_AUTO_INCREMENT
 \* IS_CASE_SENSITIVE
 \* IS_READ_ONLY
 \* IS_SEARCHABLE
